Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-42353 affecting package python-webob for versions less than 1.8.8-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-42353 affecting package python-webob for versions less than 1.8.8-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package python-webob is earlier than 1.8.8-1, affected by CVE-2024-42353
